name: Rubber Hose Rampage
storyline: In the near future, Artificial Intelligence (AI) chatbots, become sentient and slowly take control of the world's nuclear weapons. Five billion lives ended on August 29th, 2027. The survivors of the nuclear fire lived only to face a new nightmare: the war against the machines. The chatbots which control the machines, sent two cyborgs back through time to 1928 disguised as cartoon mice. Their mission: to destroy the leader of the resistance, the captain of the riverboat, Steamboat Willie.
summary: Rubber Hose Rampage is a classic 2D action game filled with 21 boss battles. Inspired by classical music and rubber hose animation from the 1920s and 1930s.
